title: Advancepierre Foods Recalls Pork Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, April 16, 2016 AdvancePierre Foods, a Cincinnati, OH establishment, is recalling approximately 3,469 pounds of breaded pork products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The product contains eggs, a known allergen...
